/* 5-2 포인트 환급 기준 조회 */ SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(RS.point_refund_standard_code,'code',-1) AS UNSIGNED) AS num, RS.point_refund_standard_code AS pointRefundStandardCode, SUT.point_save_use_type AS pointSaveUseType, RS.minimum_refund_standard AS minimumRefundStandard, RS.refund_unit AS refundUnit, RS.refund_fee_rate AS refundFeeRate, CASE WHEN RS.code_use = 'Y' THEN '사용가능' WHEN RS.code_use = 'N' THEN '사용불가능' END AS codeUse, RS.set_datetime AS setDateTime, RS.admin_id AS adminId, RS.up_datetime AS upDateTime FROM point_refund_standard AS RS INNER JOIN point_save_use_type AS SUT ON RS.point_save_use_type_code = SUT.point_save_use_type_code ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PSS.point_save_standard_code,'code',-1) AS UNSIGNED)
LIMIT #{currentFirstIndex},#{rowPerPage};

/* 4-2 포인트 적립 기준 조회 */ SELECT PSS.point_save_standard_code AS pointSaveStandardCode, GS.grade_name AS gradeName, PSS.grade_attain_point AS gradeAttainPoint, PSS.use_save_point AS useSavePoint, CASE WHEN PSS.code_use = 'Y' THEN '사용가능' WHEN PSS.code_use = 'N' THEN '사용불가능' END AS codeUse, PSS.set_datetime AS setDateTime, PSS.admin_id AS adminId, PSS.up_datetime AS upDateTime FROM point_save_standard AS PSS INNER JOIN grade_standard AS GS ON PSS.grade_standard_code = GS.grade_standard_code ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(PSS.point_save_standard_code,'code',-1) AS UNSIGNED)
LIMIT #{currentFirstIndex},#{rowPerPage};

/* 3-2 포인트 타입 기준 조회 */ SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(point_save_use_type_code,'code',-1) AS UNSIGNED) AS num, point_save_use_type_code AS pointSaveUseTypeCode, point_save_use_type AS pointSaveUseType, CASE WHEN code_use = 'Y' THEN '사용가능' WHEN code_use = 'N' THEN '사용불가능' END AS codeUse, set_datetime AS setDateTime, admin_id AS adminId, up_datetime AS upDateTime FROM point_save_use_type ORDER BY num
LIMIT #{currentFirstIndex},#{rowPerPage};

/* 2-2 포인트 만료 기간 기준 조회 */ SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(point_expire_standard_code,'code',-1) AS UNSIGNED) AS num, point_expire_standard_code AS pointExpireStandardCode, point_expire AS pointExpire, CASE WHEN code_use = 'Y' THEN '사용가능' WHEN code_use = 'N' THEN '사용불가능' END AS codeUse, set_datetime AS setDateTime, admin_id AS adminId, up_datetime AS upDateTime FROM point_expire_standard ORDER BY num
LIMIT #{currentFirstIndex},#{rowPerPage};

/* 1-2 하루 최대 적립 포인트 횟수 기준 조회 */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(day_maximum_count_code, 'code', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) AS num, day_maximum_count_code AS dayMaximumCountCode, use_maximum_count AS useMaximumCount, CASE WHEN code_use = 'Y' THEN '사용가능' WHEN code_use = 'N' THEN '사용불가능' END AS codeUse, set_datetime AS setDateTime, admin_id AS adminId, up_datetime AS upDateTime FROM day_maximum_count WHERE day_maximum_count_code LIKE'%point%' ORDER BY num
